headline.main: Man Accused of Threats to Congressman's Staff Denied Bond
headline.print_headline: Man Accused of Threats to Congressman's Staff Denied Bond

lead_paragraph: A judge says an Atlanta man accused of threatening the staff of U.S. Rep. John Lewis must undergo a mental health evaluation before the judge will consider releasing him from custody.
snippet: A judge says an Atlanta man accused of threatening the staff of U.S. Rep. John Lewis must undergo a mental health evaluation before the judge will consider releasing him from custody....
